1.title: Foundations of Software Development
steps: Learn programming basics with C or Python.
Build simple console and mini web projects.

2.title: Intermediate Development Skills
steps: Deepen DSA knowledge with arrays, strings, recursion.
Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript properly.
Start contributing small projects to GitHub.

3.title: Advanced Full-Stack Development
steps: Learn React or another frontend framework.
Learn backend development with Flask or Node.js.
Work with databases like MySQL or MongoDB.

4.title: Industry-Ready Software Engineer
steps: Prepare for interviews and real-world projects.
